name: Gridiron Grit
overview:
Gridiron Grit is a new destination focused on delivering the best original, insightful, entertaining and thought-provoking news and analysis on everything American Football with a sprinkle of humor to an all-encompassing audience.

The independent sports media company launched on January 11, 2011 by four young, knowledgable, passionate and talented teen sportswriters who want to show the world that you can accomplish absolutely anything you set your mind toâ€”as long as you think outside-the-box, trust in God and each other and give it 110 percent.

Since launching, we have been linked by Zimbio, USA Today, ConnectIn, SB Nation, Mile High Report, iFollo, DCSportsReport.com, Liquida, FantasyHype.com, The Pigskin Report, All Voices and even ESPN, among other destinations.

One of our top goals is to revolutionize sports journalism, always coming up with new innovative cutting-edge ways of not only building our name and brand and sticking out of the crowd and becoming memorable, but also blowing our audience away with an insightful, original, entertaining, thought-provoking, candid, comical and inspiring product. Thatâ€™s way more important to us than winning awards and becoming the most popular.

Thanks for taking a little time to get to know us and we appreciate your support and viewership!
